strapiPost.title: Fast Approaching
strapiPost.content:
The Razorbacks are officially back for the 2021 football season. The team held its first practice on Friday and published its full practice schedule in preparation for the season ahead.

  • For starters: With KJ Jefferson starting as QB, the preseason competition is aimed at putting the best suited players in the starting lineup for the opening game against Rice this September.
  • Light in the tunnel: The Razorbacks are stacked with talent this year, giving fans hope the team will continue its turnaround journey that began last year.

Find out more about the practice schedule and game-time mentality of the 2021 Razorback football team HERE.
